dmca.title: Darkside Productions, Inc. Asks Google to Remove Allegedly Infringing Photos
dmca.body:
Darkside Productions / BBH Media
October 21, 2004

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints 
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Sirs:

This letter is to inform you of alleged infringement as required by your Digital Millennium Copyright Act  notification policy.

Darkside Productions, Inc. has since 1997 been the operator of the website located at  www.erosquide.com and features advertising for adult entertainers worldwide. The site operates through a large number of 'Eros' related domains which are owned by Group Kaitu, LLC and which are licensed exclusively for Darkside Productions, Inc's use. 

In addition, Group Kaitu, LLC is the owner of several US trademarks, including Service Mark Registration No. 2549369 for the mark EROS GUIDE and United States Service Mark Registration No. 2793831 for the mark EROS, both for the operation of Internet Websites.

1. Identify in sufficient detail the copyrighted work that you believe has been infringed.

The copyrighted work in question is the text, photos, and other graphic components of advertisements which appear on our eros-guide website. The infringing material in question has been copied directly from our site and even retains our trademarked name and photo watermarks.

2. Identify the material that you claim is infringing the copyrighted work listed in item #1 above. The following search query:

http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&q=site%3Aangels-vancouver.com+eros+guide 

returned 43 examples of infringing material on the following website www.anqels-vancouver.com/.

The infringing material examples are as follows:
1.www.angels-vancouver.com/vancouver-escorts-hailey.htm 
2.www.angels-vancouver.com/vancouver-escorts-andrea.htm 
3.www.angels-vancouver.comlvancouver-escorts-mercer.htm

8.www.angels-vancouver.com/vancouver-escorts-carlotta.htm

[private], Oakland, CA 94607
[private], [private], North Carolina 27616
Darkside Productions / BBH Media

My contact information is as follows:

[private]
Vice President

4. Provide information, if possible, sufficient to permit Google to notify the owner/administrator of the 
web page that allegedly contains infringing material (email address is preferred).

The following registration information for the domain angels-vancouver.com was obtained from Godaddy.com's whois search engine:

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the  copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

[private]
